description: On today's show, Dan Weissmann talks about Michael Dell launching his new private Dell computer company. Also, Dan Wallach, Professor of Computer Science at Rice University, on why voting machines malfunction. Plus, Ben chats with Lisa Selin Davis, writer for Quartz, about living one week without using cash or credit cards, just mobile payments.

title: Marketplace Tech for Tuesday, November 4, 2014
